title: They're Kinda Awesome!  Razer OPUS Headphones Review
description: The Razer OPUS active noise cancelling headphones are here but this isn't the gaming headset people might expect.  These are ANC THX certified Bluetooth headphones that are meant for an active lifestyle rather than just gaming.  They're also meant to compete against the Sennheiser PXC 550 II, Sony WH1000MX3 and Bose Quietcomfort 35 II.      Buy items in this video from Amazon & other partners at the links below:  Razer OPUS -  Sennheiser Momentum -      Corsair Dark Core RGB -       Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Razer. This video is sponsored by Corsair. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.
